items: Led the Yahoo! Search Front-End engineering team (10+ FTEs) and collaborated with the Yahoo! Search Global team across regions (US, EMEA, and APAC).

Heading and managed the Front-End engineering team across multiple squads and non-squads, including Yahoo! Consumer Search, Yahoo! Local Search, Yahoo! News & Trending Search, Yahoo! APAC (TW, HK), and Yahoo! Shopping Search, driving user engagement and revenue growth.

Cultivated a strong engineering culture through cross-team collaboration, with expertise in software engineering talent development and growth. Supported organizational restructuring efforts, leading the team to maintain productivity and engagement.
Led Yahoo! Search Front-End integration with Microsoft Bing Search (2019, 2020, 2022).
Experienced in A/B testing with a strong foundation in metrics analysis, monetization strategies, and UX interaction within the Search FE engineering domain
Proficient in JavaScript with deep expertise in building reliable CI/CD release pipelines.

Collaborated cross-functionally to develop TW/HK Yahoo! Search Product Ads with the Microsoft Bing Ads team (Beijing) in 2022. Led the integration engineering plan, established the working model, and drove the project from A/B testing to a successful launching plan.
Lecturer for Yahoo! Taiwan Scrum training, recognized as a Certified Product Owner and Certified Scrum Master by Scrum Inc.

Achieved high-profile hackathon wins in world-class competitions (Yahoo!, Yahoo! Taiwan/Japan Joint Hackathon, and Mozilla). Extensive experience participating in diverse hackathons (Facebook, Line, Booking.com, and Baidu).
